video_title: The Real Problem With Toxic Relationships
transcript:
the basic problem with half of y'all is
that you all go the extra 10 miles for a
relationship when that person is not
even willing to go a single mile for you
and sometimes we mean physically I've
seen people in romantic relationships
where one person always does the
hour-long drive there and the hour-long
drive back and the other person can't be
bothered because I have so much to
do that you need to spend two hours
driving to come and see me so the short
answer is if you're in a relationship
don't go the extra mile just go the mile
that you're supposed to go and let them
meet you halfway that's how you break
out of this pattern definitely check out
Dr K's guide to mental health it
distills all of the most important
things I've learned over two decades so
check out the link in the bio and start
your journey today
